rules_text:
When this creature enters, if you control no tapped lands, it deals 3 damage to target player, battle, or planeswalker.
Hang Time {2}{R}{R} [i](Exile this card from your hand. At the beginning of your next upkeep, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste and can't be blocked that turn. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
